name: Citizenship, ethnicity, and race of graduate students, postdoctoral appointees, and doctorate-holding nonfaculty researchers in health, by sex: 2022
description: Citizenship, ethnicity, and race of graduate students, postdoctoral appointees, and doctorate-holding nonfaculty researchers in health, by sex: 2022

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

variableMeasured.name: _b_citizenship_ethnicity_race_and_field_b
variableMeasured.description: Citizenship, ethnicity, race, and field hierarchy

variableMeasured.name: field_graduate_students_all_graduate_students_total_number
variableMeasured.description: Graduate Students All Graduate Students Total Number

variableMeasured.name: field_graduate_students_all_graduate_students_percent_female
variableMeasured.description: Graduate Students All Graduate Students Percent Female

variableMeasured.name: field_graduate_students_master_s_total_number
variableMeasured.description: Graduate Students Master S Total Number

variableMeasured.name: field_graduate_students_master_s_percent_female
variableMeasured.description: Graduate Students Master S Percent Female

variableMeasured.name: field_doctorate_holding_nonfaculty_researchers_total_number
variableMeasured.description: Doctorate Holding Nonfaculty Researchers Total Number

variableMeasured.name: field_doctorate_holding_nonfaculty_researchers_percent_female
variableMeasured.description: Doctorate Holding Nonfaculty Researchers Percent Female

notes: For postdoctoral appointees and doctorate-holding nonfaculty researchers, "field" refers to the field of the unit that reports information on these groups to the Survey of Graduate Students and Postdoctorates in Science and Engineering. For more information on the comparability of these counts to other NCSES published data, see the "Technical Notes."
sources: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics, Survey of Graduate Students and Postdoctorates in Science and Engineering, 2022.
